My Games. Games that you have created are displayed on top of the page. To play a game already created hold down the selection button for the selected game for 2 seconds. play- press to play the selected game. See Detail- press to see details of the selected game . Delete- press to delete the selected game. To update your games from server hit the ‘Update Games Online’ button. To send finished games to the server hit the ‘ Send Finished Games’ button.

Create User. Type your email address in the ‘Enter an email address.’ textbox. the email will be your Username. Type password (minimum 4 characters) in the ‘Create a password’ textbox Hit the ‘Submit’ button.

Find a Game. To find a game you can either chose from the 10 most popular games Hit the ’10 most popular’ button Or you can search by criteria. Select criteria ( name: a known game. creator: from a known game creator. distance from you: select a game in your area.) type your selection search string in the text box.

Play screen, here you can select to play a game created by you or you can search for a game. To play your games hit the 'My Games'button. To search for a game created by other users hit the 'Find a Game'button.

To log in you must have a valid username and a password. If- you have a valid username and password. Type your username in the username textbox. Type your password in the password textbox. Hit the ‘Login’ button Else- Hit the ‘Create user’ button
Welcome To play a game hit the ‘Play’ button To show player statistics hit the ‘Statistics’ button. To log out of the game hit the ‘Log Out’ button.
Statistics This screen shows the player name and the score he has earned and the rank compared to other players. To show score and rank of other players hit the ‘Show all players’
